goal.en: "The major objective of this course is to introduce the knowledge required for designing and implementing a cloud-based geographic information system, including system architectures, database concept, spatial access methods, geospatial web, geospatial mash-up, mobile GIS, and cloud-based GIS applications. Students will also learn how to implement a cloud-based geographic information system through hands-on labs."
goal.ch: 本課程的主要目標為介紹分散式雲端地理資訊系統之設計與建造時所需瞭解的知識與方法。內容將包含雲端地理資訊系統之系統架構、資料庫概念、空間資料存取方法、地理空間網路、地理資訊混搭、行動式地理資訊系統、及雲端地理資訊系統應用。學生將透過實作學習如何使用程式語言建造雲端地理資訊系統。

content.en:
"1. Introduction to cloud-based geographic information system
2. Cloud-based geographic information system architecture
3. Fundamental database concepts
4. Spatial access methods
5. Geospatial web
6. Geospatial mash-up
7. Mobile GIS
8. Cloud-based GIS applications"
content.ch:
"1. 雲端地理資訊系統之簡介
2. 雲端地理資訊系統架構
3. 資料庫概念
4. 空間資料存取方法
5. 地理空間網路
6. 地理資訊混搭
7. 行動式地理資訊系統
8. 雲端地理資訊系統應用"
